name: inwarranty-newman-tests
description: Inwarranty Flow Newman API Tests on HyperExecute

scripts.test: newman run "collections/Inwarranty-flow Collection.postman_collection.json" -e "environments/QA.postman_environment.json" -d "data/testData.csv" --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export ./reports/newman-report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "Inwarranty Flow Test Report" --color on --suppress-exit-code
